space.arim.api.concurrent

Interface Task


  • public interface Task
    A task executed by a Scheduler which may be cancelled via cancel()
    Author:
    A248

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void cancel()
      Cancels the task.
      boolean isCancelled()
      Checks whether the task was cancelled using cancel()

    • Method Detail

      • cancel

        void cancel()
        Cancels the task. Cancellation need not stop a single pending execution of a task if execution has initiated (i.e., no interruption required). Only, a Scheduler should cease further scheduling of the task in timed or delayed executions.

        Implementations are strongly encouraged to make this method idempotent for repeated calls.

      • isCancelled

        boolean isCancelled()
        Checks whether the task was cancelled using cancel()
        Returns:
        true if the task is cancelled, false otherwise
